detectCmp.exists: body > section:not([id]) > div#ensNotifyBanner > div#ensNotifyBanner-inner > div:nth-child(2):not([id]) > button:nth-child(2)#ensCloseBanner

detectPopup.visible: body > section:not([id]) > div#ensNotifyBanner > div#ensNotifyBanner-inner > div:nth-child(2):not([id]) > button:nth-child(2)#ensCloseBanner

optOut.waitForThenClick: body > section:not([id]) > div#ensNotifyBanner > div#ensNotifyBanner-inner > div:nth-child(2):not([id]) > button:nth-child(2)#ensCloseBanner

test.waitForVisible: body > section:not([id]) > div#ensNotifyBanner > div#ensNotifyBanner-inner > div:nth-child(2):not([id]) > button:nth-child(2)#ensCloseBanner
